game.title: The Secret Forest Quest
game.objective: Gather 10 Fireweed Flowers in the Secret Forest
game.description: A wise herbalist in town has asked you to collect 10 Fireweed Flowers from the Secret Forest to make a powerful elixir.
game.reward: 5 Gold Coins and a Potion of Healing

task.objective: Collect 10 Fireweed Flowers in the Secret Forest
task.description: Find and collect 10 Fireweed Flowers deep within the Secret Forest. Be careful as it is rumored to be inhabited by dangerous creatures.
task.location: Secret Forest, Near the Clearwater Lake
